item.title: ðŸŸ¡ 06:00 PM threats of shelling in Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community. Consider that anxiety is still in:- Dnipropetrovsk region
item.description: ðŸŸ¡ 06:00 PM threats of shelling in Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community. Consider that anxiety is still in:- Dnipropetrovsk region#m_nikopol_that_nikopol. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
